content:
There are 47 track items FHIR-I will vote on Monday April 13th.
If you want any item removed from the vote, please contact FHRI-I co-chair.
@Carmela Couderc @Lin Zhang @Richard Townley-O'Neill @Ward Weistra @Alexander Henket @Keith Boone @Lee Surprenant @Theo Stolker @Bas van den Heuvel @Rick Geimer @Martin Ashby @Brian Reinhold @Paul Lynch @Ewout Kramer @David deRoode @Florian Apolloner @Ana Kostadinovska @Lloyd McKenzie @Chris Grenz
(I cannot find zulip user for Sean Mahoney and Muhammad Asim)

J#23040 ElementDefinition.binding.description definition is not correct Carmela A. Couderc
J#22844 Element name "Meta" instead of meta Lin Zhang
J#22840 Element-definition Extensions for use by FHIR Implementers needs updating Sean Mahoney
J#22773 Description of Reference uses "Procedure" where it shouold use "Condition" not actioned Richard Townley-O'Neill
J#22719 Updates to C# Reference Implementation links on downloads page Ward Weistra
J#22711 Fix for STU3: illegal example for identifier.system Alexander Henket
J#22085 Retain the good guidance - PRO #45 Keith W. Boone
J#22037 Clarifications required on abstract model steps - PRO #11 Muhammad Asim
J#22026 Clarifications required in IG guidance - PRO #8 Muhammad Asim
J#21526 Incorrect examples in search parameter escaping section Lee Surprenant
J#21433 Please use full Operation names, e.g. valueset-expand, questionnaire-populate, etc. - SDC #122 Theo Stolker
J#21432 Allow ActivityDefinitino to create FHIR responses - SDC #121 Bas van den Heuvel
J#21429 This is already stated in expressions. Prevent duplicate spec elements, I suggest to remove the sentence - SDC #118 Bas van den Heuvel
J#21396 Stated and defined elsewhere, no need to repeat. - SDC #85 Bas van den Heuvel
J#21394 Reference is also a valid type - SDC #83 Bas van den Heuvel
J#21392 a FHIR query - Also an expression. - SDC #81 Bas van den Heuvel
J#21391 Not only FHIRPath, but can be CQL as well - SDC #80 Bas van den Heuvel
J#21379 Change wording - SDC #68 Bas van den Heuvel
J#21371 The Questionnaire can be as well based on a library that holds the local implementations. - SDC #60 Bas van den Heuvel
J#21370 The steps that take place during the administration begin with Step 2. Where is Step 1? - SDC #59 Bas van den Heuvel
J#21349 Is it possible to include a reference to an item to be inserted here? - SDC #38 Bas van den Heuvel
J#21345 A paragraph for CQL should be included as well - SDC #34 Bas van den Heuvel
J#21329 Indicate that "launchContext" and "itemContext" are extensions by adding the word extension - SDC #18 Bas van den Heuvel
J#21318 Why SHOULD? - SDC #9 Bas van den Heuvel
J#21272 Description of Task.status "order" code is too narrow Rick Geimer
J#21216 Typo in Notes about searching on Numbers Lee Surprenant
J#21180 Parameters schematron is invalid Martin Ashby
J#21153 Schematron is missing for Parameters resource DSTU3 Martin Ashby
J#21028 Insufficient documentation on sorted search Brian Reinhold
J#20950 answerOption used where unitOption should be Paul Lynch
J#20905 How to hande an element with a choice of types as the target in a mapping rule Ewout Kramer
J#20849 Make name optional for mapping rules Ewout Kramer
J#20848 Can dependent rules and nested rules be combined? Ewout Kramer
J#20847 What's the purpose of target.contextType? Ewout Kramer
J#20846 Should we align transforms and FhirPath? Ewout Kramer
J#20845 Can 'type' and 'min'/'max' be used independently? Ewout Kramer
J#20844 Add date, time and dateTime to StructureMap.group.rule.target.parameter.value[x] Ewout Kramer
J#20843 Consider removing 'none' from StructureMapGroupTypeMode Ewout Kramer
J#20841 Rule source 'default' should be of type string Ewout Kramer
J#20840 Document that repeating dependent rules are allowed Ewout Kramer
J#20839 Allow mapping groups with 0 rules Ewout Kramer
J#20822 IG publisher documentation points to outdated Ruby/Jekyll install page David DeRoode
J#20629 Clean up http summary table (missing/wrong headers) Florian Apolloner
J#19032 n my opinion the proposed FHIR API for Adaptve Testing is incorrect Ana Kostadinovska
J#19011 PROM scoring representation activity unclarities Ana Kostadinovska
J#15964 Element with id only should be invalid Lloyd McKenzie
J#13414 Validation of normative resources Chris Grenz
Block vote is postponed to next week (Monday 4/20).
